synastry.title: understanding synastry
synastry.description: synastry is the art of comparing two birth charts to understand the dynamics of a relationship. it reveals how two people interact, their compatibility, and potential challenges they might face together.
synastry.analysis: by analyzing the positions of planets, houses, and aspects between two charts, we can gain insights into:
insights: potential areas of growth and challenge
synastry.conclusion: this analysis helps you understand the deeper dynamics of your relationships and provides guidance for building stronger, more harmonious connections.
